bio: I'm a Twin Cities based Software Developer and Musician. Spent a lot of my 20s playing gigs across the country, and now I spend my time writing code.

boxes.title: Projects
boxes.paragraph: Personal projects I've worked on in my spare time
items: [MyGig](https://mygig.online) - A site for musicians to keep track of their events and setlists
[Linkst.rip](https://linkst.rip) - A URL shortening service built with PHP and React

[Ocarina of Time Entrance Tracker](https://tracker.brakke.dev) - A tracker built to be used with the popular Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Randomizer. Includes a path finding tool to assist the user and prevent confusion. Built with React.
[Timelapse_EQ](https://github.com/brakkum/timelapse_eq) - A Python based CLI for manipulating the exposure of photographs in a time-lapse automatically

[Flickr Resizer](https://github.com/brakkum/flickr_resize_chrome_ext) - A quick Google Chrome extension made to prevent photos from overtaking the entire screen when utilizing 'View all sizes' on Flickr
[TimeClock](https://github.com/brakkum/timeclock_app) - Another Python CLI, made to keep track of time spent on client tickets
[Min Browser](https://github.com/minbrowser/min) - A minimalistic web browser built in JavaScript using Electron
[Porte](https://github.com/sunfarm/porte) - Simple personal websites with React (it's what this site is built with!)

boxes.title: Gear
boxes.paragraph: Some things I use that help me get the job done

boxes.title: Languages and Frameworks
boxes.paragraph: Some technologies I've worked with and enjoy thus far
